item.title: xkcd plots with R
item.description: The webcomic series xkcd by Randall Munroe is one of my favorite things on the internet. In his comics, the physicist Munroe jokes about science, math, and pop-culture. Occasionally, the comics feature hand-drawn graphs, such as this one Itâ€™s possible to create plots with the same style in R by using xkcd, an addon package for the ggplot2 package. The package can be installed from CRAN, additionally one needs to install an xkcd-style font, as described in the vignette of the package.
